type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaSingleEntryLibraryDependency
type.description:
"Single-Entry Module Library" as IDEA calls it. For example a single Jar file with sources Jar.
@since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getFile
method.description:
Returns the file for this dependency.

returns:The file. Never null.

method.name: getJavadoc
method.description:
Returns the Javadoc directory/archive for this dependency.

returns:The Javadoc file. Returns null when the Javadoc is not available for this dependency.

method.name: getSource
method.description:
Returns the source directory/archive for this dependency.

returns:The source file. Returns null when the source is not available for this dependency.

property.name: file
property.description:
Returns the file for this dependency.

returns:The file. Never null.

property.name: javadoc
property.description:
Returns the Javadoc directory/archive for this dependency.

returns:The Javadoc file. Returns null when the Javadoc is not available for this dependency.

property.name: source
property.description:
Returns the source directory/archive for this dependency.

returns:The source file. Returns null when the source is not available for this dependency.
